title: Hellboy BPRD fill Pack (Ocnosis)
description:
This is a Hellboy BPRD fill pack with lots of stuff gathered from different torrents and a little bit of my own.
Even so i think i found some unique stuff, and i put it all together here.
This isnt a full chronology ... or a reading order ... for a reading order use google ... this is just a pack of issues to fill in missing spots and some bonus material


File List:


Hellboy BPRD

   1st Hellboy
1 - Convention Sketch - (1st Hellboy Picture).JPG
2 - Dime Press 4 - (1st Hellboy Cover).JPG
